name: find-restriction-sites
title: Find Restriction Sites
description: Identify restriction enzyme recognition sites in DNA sequences
content:
Overview

This application identifies restriction enzyme recognition sites in a DNA sequence for specified enzymes.

Features

  • Searches for multiple enzymes simultaneously
  • Reports recognition sequences
  • Provides cut position details
  • Indicates overhang types (sticky/blunt)

Parameters

  • DNA Sequence: Sequence to search
  • Enzymes: Space-separated enzyme names
  • Topology: Specify if linear

Output

Returns a JSON file with detailed information about each restriction site including positions, recognition sequences, and cut patterns.
command: git clone https://github.com/CamberCloud-Inc/prod_apps.git prod_apps_clone 2>/dev/null || (cd prod_apps_clone && git pull) && pip install -q biopython biomni && python prod_apps_clone/biomni/molecular_biology/find_restriction_sites.py "${dnaSequence}" ${enzymes} ${linear} -o "${outputDir}"
